import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container,Row,Col, Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap' import { PageBreadcrumb } from '../../component/breadcrumb/Breadcrumb.comp' import { SearchForm } from '../../component/search-form/SearchForm.comp' import { Tablecomp } from '../../component/table/Table.comp' import ticket from "../../assets/data/dummy-ticket.json" export const TicketListing = () => { const[str , setstr]=useState("") const[disTic , setticket]=useState(ticket) useEffect(()=>{ },[str]) const searchTicket =(strr)=>{ const display=ticket.filter((row)=>rows.sub.toLowerCase().includes(strr.toLowerCase())); console.log(display) setticket(display) } const onhandlechange=e=>{ const {value}=e.target setstr(value) searchTicket(value) } return (


) }
